summary: This is an email from March 10, 2021, requesting assistance from NYPD/FBI personnel to provide two agents to bring digital images to 500 Pearl Street for Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team to review. The assistance is needed for an all-day event on March 18, 2021.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the subject of the request; her defense team needs to review digital images as part of her legal case.

events.title: Digital Evidence Review for Maxwell Defense
events.description: Planned all-day event at 500 Pearl Street where Maxwell's defense team will review digital images provided by law enforcement agents.

keyFacts: Law enforcement (NYPD/FBI) is coordinating to provide digital evidence to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team for review.
The evidence review is scheduled for March 18, 2021, at 500 Pearl Street and is expected to take all day.
Two agents are requested to transport and wait with a hard drive containing digital images during the defense's review.
